## useDebouncedReducer() function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useDebouncedReducer<S, A, R extends Reducer<S, A>>(reducer: R, initialArg: S, init: undefined, delay: number): [ReducerState<R>, Dispatch<A> & {
    flush: () => void;
    cancel: () => void;
}];
```
